short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interface for authenticators such a Smart Cards and YubiKeys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Axiad Portal Extension is a bridge between Axiad Unified Portal and the OS Smart Card interface to allow users to issue and manage their security devices, smart cards, and tokens.
